title: BENNINGTON 3-PRONG 3.5MM, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE GOLD RIVIÈRE NECKLACE
description:
NEW STONE SIZE: 3.5MM
Our 3-prong rivière in a new, daintier 3.5MM size. The Bennington 3.5MM Rivière is crafted with lab-grown white sapphires in a minimal 3-prong 18k gold vermeil setting.
details:
Metal: 18k gold vermeil - a 2.5 micron layer of gold over sterling silver.

Setting: 3-prong
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Stone Size: 3.5MM



15 inches, 22.04 CTW DEW
16 inches, 23.31 CTW DEW

18 inches, 26.46 CTW DEW
